original_text: And he said, Hear thou therefore the word of the Lord: I saw the Lord sitting on his throne, and all the host of heaven standing by him on his right hand and on his left.
korean_text: 미가야가 이르되 그런즉 왕은 여호와의 말씀을 들으소서 내가 보니 여호와께서 그의 보좌에 앉으셨고 하늘의 만군이 그의 좌우편에 모시고 서 있는데

sentences.original_text: Hear thou therefore the word of the Lord
I saw the Lord sitting on his throne
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 주께서 그의 왕좌에 앉으신 것을 보았다

sentences.original_text: and all the host of heaven
on his right hand and on his left
